name: Test02 - Verify New Item In Shopping Cart
description: This Test verifies a new item has been added in shopping cart
descriptionHtml: This Test verifies a new item has been added in shopping cart

testStage.description: This Test verifies a new item has been added in shopping cart

steps.name: Business Flow: Add To Shopping Cart

parameters.name: elem
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f84c54d068304491b73c7cb467188b72)] -> css selector: a[class='ico-cart']]

parameters.name: elems
parameters.value: [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f84c54d068304491b73c7cb467188b72)] -> xpath: //table[@class='cart']/tbody/tr], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (f84c54d068304491b73c7cb467188b72)] -> xpath: //table[@class='cart']/tbody/tr]]
